name: Alienautics
description:
INTRO
The Alienautics Space Force crew has been taken hostage by Xeno Mercenaries. With the help of a companion robot, the last survivor of the Alienautics Mothership is on a mission to rescue the crew members from the volcanic planet Luminus Prime. What will he discover?

WORLD
The world of Alienautics is packed with sci fi industrial architecture and volcanic off world alien terrain. There are exotic and strategic locations for different types of combat, stealth and platforming challenges throughout the missions.

RESOURCES
On the planet surface,there are four different types of resources: Chromium, Thorium, Uranium and Mercury. Each serves its own purpose; either powering deadly energy weapons, exploding on throw or fueling spaceships. The resources are collectable via mining, kills or capsule pickups.

Features
The game features a single player campaign. Some of the core mechanics of the game are listed below.

  • Cover Based Challenging Gunplay
  • Tactical & Strategic Enemy AI
  • Energy & Projectile Weapons
  • Inventory Management



  • Stealth & Free Hand Combat
  • Environmental Puzzles
  • Massive Alien Boss Fights
  • Blood, Gore & Explosions
